text: Poomarathanalil is a 1997 Indian Malayalam film directed by AK Muraleedharan and starring Sreenivasa Varma and Anju in the lead roles.http://spicyonion.com/title/poomarathanalil-malayalam-movie/ ==Cast== * Ajith Vijayakumar * Anju (Baby Anju) * Devan * Jagannadha Varma * Janardanan * Kovai Sarala * Mala Aravindan * Sreenivasa Varma * Ushakumari ==References== ==External links== * Category:1997 films Category:Indian films Category:1990s Malayalam-language films
title: Poomarathanalil
